text:
="preserve">Haldun Boysan (6 July 1958 – 31 August 2020) was a Turkish actor. He was born in Ankara. He was known for his roles as Kamil in "On Board" (1998), Fethi in "Robbery Alla Turca" (2005) and as Vasfi in "The Jackal" (2010).
Boysan died on 31 August 2020 from a heart attack in Nevşehir, Turkey at the age of 62.
